articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: The Northern Lights could return this week – 5 ways to plan your photo shoot - TechRadar
articles.description: The aurora could return, here's how to make sure you're ready
articles.content: If you missed the recent show from the aurora borealis (or northern lights, as they're known in the northern hemisphere), fear not – we could be on the cusp of a repeat during the week starting June … [+8129 chars]
